product_name: Komperdell Titanal Contour PL Trekking Poles - Pair - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Komperdell Titanal Contour PL Trekking Poles have aluminum alloy construction that makes them lightweight and strong, offering comfort and added stability on your day hikes or extended treks. 3-section Titanal aluminum poles telescope from 105 - 140 cm; Power Lock II lock mechanisms secure pole sections with an easy click of a lever. EVA foam grips are heat-insulating and lighter weight than traditional grips; padded wrist straps offer a high level of comfort. Komperdell Titanal Contour PL Trekking Poles feature tungsten carbide flex tips. Trekking baskets. Closeout.
short_description: The Komperdell Titanal Contour PL Trekking Poles have aluminum alloy construction that makes them lightweight and strong, offering comfort and added stability on your day hikes or extended treks.
